column3: College of Environmental Sciences and Engineering
column5: This course is accredited by the Institute of Chartered Foresters and gives partial fulfilment of Professional Membership Entry.Can the world’s forests be managed sustainably? This one-year course will develop your understanding of forest ecosystems and their role in the global environment, and of the goods and services that forests can provide.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
